entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Bernières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending overnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
